column1: cite: Smith, R. G., & Hofmann, M. (2020). A Lexical Frequency Analysis of Irish Sign Language. TEANGA, the Journal of the Irish Association for Applied Linguistics, 11, 18–47. https://doi.org/10.35903/teanga.v11i1.162

PT: PRO2/PRO3: signs that include all itterations of "INDEX" minus PRO1 signs
PRO1/PRO2/PRO3: signs that include all itterations of "INDEX" (no CL prefix)
The first 314 unique glosses account for half of all glosses in the corpus
